name: Meeple Jump! - Demo Day!
description:
In Meeple Jump - Demo Day, you are a Meeple! A Meeple is a board game piece that looks like a pawn from chess. When you are a Meeple, your goal is to get to the end of the level and grab all the coins you can!

--IMPORTANT FOR MAC USERS--

I am NOT a "Verified Developer" so please keep that in mind and adjust your security settings to allow Meeple Jump to run. OR you could just play on the Web Version

--IMPORTANT FOR WINDOWS 10 USERS--

I AM an "Unknown Publisher" (but it is much easier to run Meeple Jump on Windows) NO security settings changes needed BY DEFAULT.

--IMPORTANT FOR WINDOWS 11 USERS--

I WOULDN'T Try to play Meeple Jump on a Windows 11 computer, it was not created with Windows 11 in mind, but it MAY work.

--WEB VERSION--

Wanna play in your browser?

https://epicbettafish.itch.io/meeplejumpweb
